## Overview
***

**Welcome to theSeattleStatSummer Introduction to R!**  

This course is for students who have little to no familiarity with the R programming language and want to learn more about how to use R to import, wrangle, and visualize data.

The course will provide students with **“hands-on” experience* working with data using the R programming language for statistical computing, a popular open-source solution for data analysis and visualization.  

### Instructors

`r config::get("instructors")`
